code:
mindmap
  root((Safety & Privacy Notes))
    PII Handling
      "Avoid storing raw resume text"
      "Hash resume IDs before logging"
      "Strip emails/phone numbers from analytics"
      "Use HTTPS for uploads"
    Data Retention
      "Temporary in-memory parsing"
      "Optional encrypted cache with TTL"
      "User initiated purge"
    Rate Limits
      "Throttle API requests per IP"
      "Backoff when third-party APIs return 429"
      "Queue resume parsing jobs"
    Abuse Mitigation
      "Validate file type & size"
      "Scan uploads for malware signatures"
      "Reject prompt injection in AI responses"
    Access Control
      "ENV-stored API keys"
      "Principle of least privilege for DB"
      "Audit logs for admin actions"
    Compliance Considerations
      "GDPR-style export/delete workflows"
      "Privacy policy surfaced in UI"
      "Vendor DPAs on record"
